name: Ace for Monstra Admin
tagline: Ace editor from cloud9.io for Monstra CMS
body:
Want a fantastic editor for Monstra CMS's theme editing pages in the admin panel? This is it.

## What is Ace?

Ace is an embeddable text editor implemented in Javascript and made and shared by [Cloud9](http://ace.c9.io/#nav=about). It provides syntax highlighting for various markup and scripting languages including HTML, CSS and Javascript making it an excellent choice for editing Monstra theme files via Monstra's Admin interface.

## About the plugin

This plugin is an implementation of Ace for [Monstra](http://monstra.org) provided by [MonstraHost](http://www.monstrahost.com).

## Installation

* Download the file and place the unzipped or untarred directory in your Monstra installation's 'plugins' directory. 
* Disable 'codemirror' because this plugin provides the same functionality
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
